original_title: Tony Bennett: Live by Request - An All-Star Tribute
overview: On the evening of December 7, 1998, a host of stars turned out for a spectacular 50th-anniversary tribute to one of the best-loved and most influential singers of our time, Mr. Tony Bennett. Dubbed "An All-Star Tribute," The event was broadcast live on A&E Network from Sony Music Studios in New York City and comprised the 10th installment of Live by Request, the critically acclaimed, Emmy Award-winning live music series created by Mr. Bennett in 1996.
title: Tony Bennett: Live by Request - An All-Star Tribute
